title: From the Vault: The Holy Undead, Part 1
itunes:title: From the Vault: The Holy Undead, Part 1
description:
We tend to relegate zombies and the walking dead to the infernal realm of demons, necromancers and the emptied charnel houses of Hell. So it might surprise you to know that, in some traditions, reanimated human corpses are pius church-goers. In this classic episode of Stuff to Blow Your Mind, Robert and Joe discuss the holy undead. (originally published 10/19/2021)

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
